rooms.description: Serves as the entry point with a welcoming open space that transitions into a combined living and dining area. The design integrates Kerala-style motifs with subtle Vastu recommendations ensuring positive energy flow.
Efficiently designed kitchen with modern amenities integrated into a traditional setting. Adjacent utility area for storage and cleaning, aligning with local building practices.
A dedicated library space that doubles as a quiet study area. Decorated with handcrafted wooden shelves and natural lighting to encourage reading and reflection.
Functional bathroom designed in a compact space with tiled flooring and efficient fixtures. Vastu-aligned placement ensures balance.
Small storage room for essentials, keeping the studio apartment clutter-free and functional.

openings.description: A wide doorway with traditional Kerala motifs, ensuring the flow of positive energy as per Vastu principles.
Larger window providing natural light and ventilation; oriented for optimum sunlight exposure according to local climate and Vastu.
Sized window to allow adequate daylight, placed as per Vastu guidelines for mental clarity and focus.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed with Kerala aesthetics. Placed in the most auspicious direction as per Vastu for rest and health.
A versatile studio space that doubles as a workspace or additional living area. Minimalist design to maximize functionality and natural light.
Small bedroom for occasional guests or storage. Designed with simplicity in mind while retaining Kerala charm.
Compact bathroom located near bedrooms for convenience; designed with water efficiency and space optimization in mind.

openings.description: Provides an outdoor space overlooking the garden. Balconies are strategically placed as per Vastu to enhance relaxation and natural ventilation.
Larger window for adequate sunlight exposure aligned with Vastu principles for health and energy balance.
Window designed to provide ample natural light while maintaining privacy. Oriented according to local climate conditions and Vastu guidelines.

notes.budget_constraints: Design optimized for cost efficiency with emphasis on modular spaces and multi-functional areas. Materials selected are locally available and eco-friendly to adhere to traditional Kerala aesthetics.
notes.vastu_considerations: All room placements and openings have been considered according to Vastu principles ensuring optimal flow of energy and auspiciousness. The design respects the cardinal directions with emphasis on natural light, ventilation, and space harmony.
